original_text: For there are many rebellious people, full of meaningless talk and deception, especially those of the circumcision group.
korean_text: 불순종하고 헛된 말을 하며 속이는 자가 많은 중 할례파 가운데 특히 그러하니

sentences.original_text: For there are many rebellious people
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 많은 반항하는 사람들이 있기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: full of meaningless talk and deception
sentences.korean_translation: 의미 없는 말과 속임수로 가득 차 있습니다

sentences.original_text: especially those of the circumcision group
